channel.title: Ice barrage multi casting help
channel.description: Well to test if my ice barrage works i put a bunch of lesser demons in 1 spot and i barraged oen to see if the all got hit. and i put it in the bandos area and i no that its multi there. How can i make it so my barrage hits multiple characters/ npcs at once and make it freeze longer??

item.title: Ice barrage multi casting help
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:

Well to test if my ice barrage works i put a bunch of lesser demons in 1 spot and i barraged oen to see if the all got hit. and i put it in the bandos area and i no that its multi there.

and make it freeze longer??
